Detailed Description

An Appearance component encapsulating attributes for fogging.

void render ( RenderState &  state  )  const [virtual]

Render this object, for inner use.

Note: Fog should be rendered only at second rendering pass(pass=2). In other cases, do nothing.

Reimplemented from Object3D.
